Articles.Content:
Hello my fellow kerbanauts,

I'm here to present a project that I started a little over a while ago; the Grand Tour of the Kerbol System - using only one ship, a ship by my own design: the KSS Pidgeon Space Shuttle.

The shuttle will carry multiple rovers and probes to leave a little landmark on the various worlds I will be traveling to.

I'm recording the whole thing and using it to jump start a small YouTube channel.

Little side not before I show you the episodes: Episodes 0-3 are in 18.4, and we had to start over again in episode 4, due to the patching process and a corruption in the save-file. But all for the best, the pidgeon has a new design and I'm doing some more planning using the alarm clock and some mechjeb support.

List of Episodes:

Episode 0:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y3G2a28VH4g

Episode 1:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j55Ln9IGuIk

Episode 2:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jh7FHCcw_EE

Episode 3:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5ZNLC_sV2Us

Episode 4:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RJ21Ifk5jRY

Hope you'll support my channel by subscribing and following my channel. Please feel free to use this thread as a place of discussion and reviewing. Thank you very much for the support and for watching, stay tuned for more!

TheIlyane

Edited May 19, 2013 by theIlyane
Added new video!

Hello again! My new episode is up with the next coming up in 3 to 4 days!

Episode 5:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UKGOmI8jxuk

Please like and subscribe if you like my videos; but most of all: ENJOY!
